attributes.action: Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details: Look at the thousands of videos of suffering dogs, horses, nature, adults and children with specific needs.   As above also.
attributes.background: Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public to end the suffering of dogs, horses, nature, adults and children.   This is an outdated event.  If you can change the law on selling vapes and cigarettes- then you can do this.   Be forward thinking and have drone shows!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
